name: CALUS Mini-Tool
flavor_text: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

frame.name: MIDA Synergy
frame.description: Superb handling. Move faster with this lightweight weapon equipped. This weapon grants additional speed benefits when MIDA Multi-Tool is also equipped.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size
perks.name: Tactical Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description:
This magazine is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Greatly increases stability 
  •  Slightly decreases range
perks.name: Steady Rounds

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts handling and stability.
perks.name: Slideways

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Threat Detector

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one target. Improves handling.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: This weapon gains increased airborne effectiveness as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Air Assault

perks.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
perks.name: Moving Target

perks.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Grave Robber

perks.description: This weapon gains further increased airborne effectiveness as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Air Assault

perks.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.
perks.name: Disruption Break

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Surrounded

perks.description: Each rapid kill with this weapon progressively increases reload speed for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for an improved duration.
perks.name: Disruption Break

perks.description: This weapon gains improved bonus damage when three or more targets are in close proximity.
perks.name: Surrounded

perks.description: Each rapid final blow with this weapon progressively increases reload speed substantially for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: This weapon becomes more accurate and boosts handling as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Eye of the Storm

perks.description: Grants a short period of increased stability and accuracy on initial trigger pull.
perks.name: Tap the Trigger

perks.description:
Defeating a target spreads scorch to those nearby.
More powerful combatants and opposing Guardians cause scorch in a larger radius.
perks.name: Incandescent

perks.description: This weapon becomes more accurate and boosts handling as your health gets lower. Increases stability.
perks.name: Eye of the Storm

perks.description:
Defeating a target spreads a longer lasting scorch to those nearby.
More powerful combatants and opposing Guardians cause scorch in a larger radius.
perks.name: Incandescent

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon while your Super is full grant a bonus to Strength and Discipline for a moderate duration.
perks.name: To Excess
